Title: Relates to the use of body imaging scanning equipment in correctional facilities throughout the state in connection with the implementation of a facility's security program
Summary: Authorizes the use of body imaging scanning equipment in correctional facilities throughout the state in connection with the implementation of a facility's security program, subject to certain regulations and limitations.
LawCode: Amd ยง3502, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to body imaging scanning equipment; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
